org.minijson.builder

Interface JsonStructureBuilder

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    BareJsonBuilder, RichJsonBuilder
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractBareJsonBuilder, MiniJsonBuilder, SimpleJsonBuilder

    public interface JsonStructureBuilder
    Builds "JSON compatible" object structure comprising Map and List.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Object buildJsonStructure(Object jsonObj)
      Converts the object to a nested structure of Map/List, object/JsonCompatible, and JsonSerializable + primitive types.
      Object buildJsonStructure(Object jsonObj, int depth)
      Traverses down to the depth level (in terms of Object, Map, List).

    • Method Detail

      • buildJsonStructure

        Object buildJsonStructure(Object jsonObj)
                          throws JsonBuilderException
        Converts the object to a nested structure of Map/List, object/JsonCompatible, and JsonSerializable + primitive types. Uses the default depth of the object (not necessarily 0). Note that the return value (structure) is either Map or List
